original_text: Here are the names of the Israelites who went to Egypt with Jacob. Each one went there with his family.
korean_text: 야곱과 함께 각각 자기 가족을 데리고 애굽에 이른 이스라엘 아들들의 이름은 이러하니

sentences.original_text: Here are the names of the Israelites
who went to Egypt with Jacob
Each one went there with his family
sentences.korean_translation: 각자 자기 가족과 함께 그곳으로 갔습니다
